thread.title: Well Located, Very friendly staff
thread.title_full: Well Located, Very friendly staff - Review of Hotel Axel Opera by HappyCulture, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: pjhindmarsh
title: Well Located, Very friendly staff
text:
Excellent location, exceptionally friendly staff, basic but otherwise good breakfast, Lift and room were a little small, but otherwise perfect for a week-end break. Minature cakes and pastries available all day which was a nice touch
Room Tip: Check the size of your room when confirming, the double we were in was quite small but otherwise fin... See more room tips
